basics.name: Chien Nguyen
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: I am an AI Engineer at AIMENEXT JSC, Vietnam. I graduated in Applied Mathematics and informatics from Hanoi University of Science and Technology in 2020."

education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
education.area: Applied Mathematics and Informatics, Talented Program

highlights: Build OCR-based system for extracting transaction information to enhance customer service.
Develop an administrative document digitization system leveraging OCR and LLM for efficient data extraction and analysis.
Implement solution for enhance input image quality through the application of color style transfer models in the preprocessing stage.

work.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN GIAO HÀNG TIẾT KIỆM
highlights: Build an eKYC system incorporating OCR and ReID for information extraction from identity cards and driving licenses and face matching.
Build a package management system for tracking, extract order information and measuring package dimensions.
Deploy and monitor above model and service on-premise and edge devices, ensuring efficient model execution and logging of performance metrics.
Build OCR systems capable of handling diverse document types (ID cards, documents, license plates) in real-world environments.
Enhance the preprocessing system, focusing on rectifying document images for improved OCR accuracy.
Develop Semantic Segmentation and Object Detection models to analyze medical images.
Develop a tool to streamline data annotation for deep learning projects.
Research and build solutions for speaker diarization, speaker identification problem for meeting note application.
Develop machine learning model for detecting road region from satellite images.

volunteer.position: Speaker count: A new building block for speaker diarization, in APSIPA 2021
volunteer.summary: Thanh Thi-Hien Duong; Phi-Le Nguyen; Hong-Son Nguyen; Duc-Chien Nguyen; Huy Phan; Ngoc Q. K. Duong
